story_final_02_07000/2401_1201_0200_10:
Paulo! [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I think they’re
over there!
story_final_02_07000/2401_1201_0300_10:
Colress’s device is showing us Hoopa’s location!
That’s probably where Giovanni is, too!
story_final_02_07000/2401_1201_0600_10: you won’t be reaching that location.
story_final_02_07000/2401_1201_0800_10:
Team Rocket will regain its former glory here on
Pasio, together with the great Giovanni!
story_final_02_07000/2401_1201_0900_10: We won’t accept failure—not like last time!
story_final_02_07000/2401_1201_1000_10: You mean...back when Team Rocket disbanded?
story_final_02_07000/2401_1201_1200_10:
Of course, I don’t think there’s much need to
worry. We’re just taking extra precautions.
story_final_02_07000/2401_1201_1300_10: I’ll crush you here and now!
story_final_02_07000/2401_1201_1600_10: What do you think you’re doing?
story_final_02_07000/2401_1201_1700_10:
Even if you get in our way, there’s nothing for you
to gain from it!
story_final_02_07000/2401_1201_1900_10: anyone who takes advantage of plans I made!
story_final_02_07000/2401_1201_2000_10:
I was going to use Hoopa’s power to take control
of Pasio! It should have been ME!
story_final_02_07000/2401_1201_2200_10: This puny runt of a Trainer ruined everything!
story_final_02_07000/2401_1201_2400_10:
Because I refuse to let THAT MAN succeed with
MY plan!
story_final_02_07000/2401_1201_2600_10:
if you cooperate with me, I’ll let your
transgressions slide.
story_final_02_07000/2401_1201_2700_10: Hey! How can you even say something like—
story_final_02_07000/2401_1201_2900_10: No way it’s OK! He’s the one who hurt Rockruff!
story_final_02_07000/2401_1201_3100_10: Ghetsis isn’t our main problem right now.
story_final_02_07000/2401_1201_3500_10:
If we’re going to do this, let’s crush that man’s
plans immediately!
